          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Posványkakastaréj</string>
            <string language="en-US">Marsh lousewort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sumpf lousewort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lousewort de marais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lousewort do pântano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lousewort della palude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έλος lousewort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lousewort del pantano</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A posványkakastaréj (Pedicularis palustris) élőhelyeinek lecsapolása miatt ritkult meg</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Marsh lousewort (Pedicularis palustris) became rare due to the drainage of its habitat</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">növénytan</string>
            <string language="en-US">botany</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">természetvédelem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">jellegzetes faj</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Sumpf lousewort (Pedicularis palustris) wurde 
zur Entwässerung seines Lebensraums seltenes passendes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le lousewort de marais (palustris de Pedicularis)
est devenu dû rare au drainage de son habitat</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O lousewort do pântano (palustris de 
Pedicularis) transformou-se raro devido à drenagem de seu habitat</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il lousewort della palude (palustris di 
Pedicularis) si è transformato in in raro dovuto il drenaggio del 
relativo habitat</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το έλος lousewort (palustris Pedicularis) έγινε
σπάνιο οφειλόμενο στην αποξήρανση του βιότοπού του</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El lousewort del pantano (palustris de 
Pedicularis) se convirtió en  raro debido al drenaje de su habitat</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Botanik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">botanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
